Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
What deermines a valid notaraisation is:
1) height is heighter than last noatrised ht
2) block hash matches the ht being notarized
3) min sigs notaries

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @jl777c i think that my use of int64_t for some stats is wasteful (per-block stats will never need such a large datatype), so I am going to refactor those to `unsigned int`. I will leave total chain stats as int64_t, since that seems more future-proof. `-zindex` is working, with reindex detection. And I have notarization stats as well. To finally merge this stuff to KMD, it needs to know how to look at sprout joinsplits

Content:
definition
```"Voluntarily Told," "Voluntold"

There are two different kinds of voluntold:
A. The gunny walks into the office and says, "Man, wouldn't the floor look nice if somebody buffed it?" Which means,"Buff the floor."

B. "I need two volunteers to stand out in front of Best Buy this Saturday collecting Toys for Tots."
" ... "
"Jones, Smith, you're collecting Toys for Tots this weekend." ```
